pullRequest.title: CDPCP-1669. Verify user exists in an environment before getting keytab
pullRequest.bodyText:
Currently it's possible for the user to provide a user that isn't
present (hasn't been synced) into an environment. In this case we
throw an appropriate exception.

nodes.bodyText:
Maybe just say: Actor %s has not been synced into environment %s"
Btw, what BadRequestException translates to the user?
